summary.span: 对一个序列并行应用累加器函数。

span.span: Applies in parallel an accumulator function over a sequence.

summary.span: 此重载在顺序实现中不可用。

span.span: This overload is not available in the sequential implementation.

returns.span: 已转换的累加器最终值。

span.span: The transformed final accumulator value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载是特定于并行化查询。This overload is specific to parallelized queries. 并行化的查询可能会进行分区的数据源序列划分为若干子序列 （分区）。A parallelized query may partition the data source sequence into several sub-sequences (partitions). `updateAccumulatorFunc`对分区中每个元素调用。The `updateAccumulatorFunc` is invoked on each element within partitions. 然后，每个分区生成单个累计的结果。Each partition then yields a single accumulated result. `combineAccumulatorsFunc`然后调用每个分区，以生成单个元素的结果。The `combineAccumulatorsFunc` is then invoked on the results of each partition to yield a single element. 此元素随后将转换`resultSelector`函数。This element is then transformed by the `resultSelector` function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载是特定于处理并行化的查询。This overload is specific to processing a parallelized query. 并行化的查询可能会进行分区的数据源序列划分为若干子序列 （分区）。A parallelized query may partition the data source sequence into several sub-sequences (partitions). `updateAccumulatorFunc`对分区中每个元素调用。The `updateAccumulatorFunc` is invoked on each element within partitions. 然后，每个分区生成单个累计的结果。Each partition then yields a single accumulated result. `combineAccumulatorsFunc`然后调用每个分区，以生成单个元素的结果。The `combineAccumulatorsFunc` is then invoked on the results of each partition to yield a single element. 此元素随后将转换`resultSelector`函数。This element is then transformed by the `resultSelector` function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载的任何方法会导致完全缓冲的合并，以返回结果之前执行。This overload of the Any method causes a fully-buffered merge to be performed before the result is returned. 合并行为可能会影响性能或大型枚举中导致内存不足异常。The merge behavior can impact performance or cause an out of memory exception in large enumerables. 若要避免合并行为，使用任何采用 Func 参数，重载也可以使用如 FirstOrDefault 一种替代方法。To avoid the merge behavior, use the overload of Any that takes a Func parameter, or else use an alternative method such as FirstOrDefault.

summary.span: 启用将数据源视为“已经排序”的处理方法，重写默认的将数据源视为“未经排序”的处理方法。

span.span: Enables treatment of a data source as if it were ordered, overriding the default of unordered.

summary.span: 只可以对由 AsParallel、ParallelEnumerable.Range 和 ParallelEnumerable.Repeat 返回的非泛型序列调用 AsOrdered。

span.span: AsOrdered may only be invoked on non-generic sequences returned by AsParallel, ParallelEnumerable.Range, and ParallelEnumerable.Repeat.

returns.span: 将要维护后续查询运算符中的原始排序的源序列。

span.span: The source sequence which will maintain the original ordering in the subsequent query operators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 性能和保留中并行处理顺序之间存在自然的张力。A natural tension exists between performance and preserving order in parallel processing. 默认情况下，并行的查询行为就像结果的排序是任意的除非应用 AsOrdered 或在查询中没有显式的 OrderBy 运算符。By default, a parallelized query behaves as if the ordering of the results is arbitrary unless AsOrdered is applied or there is an explicit OrderBy operator in the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 中的顺序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 性能和保留中并行处理顺序之间存在自然的张力。A natural tension exists between performance and preserving order in parallel processing. 默认情况下，并行的查询行为就像结果的排序是任意的除非应用 AsOrdered 或在查询中没有显式的 OrderBy 运算符。By default, a parallelized query behaves as if the ordering of the results is arbitrary unless AsOrdered is applied or there is an explicit OrderBy operator in the query. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 中的顺序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 源分区程序 GetOrderedPartitions 方法排序时使用已启用，而如果顺序不是使用分区程序的 GetPartitions 启用 （默认值）。The source partitioner's GetOrderedPartitions method is used when ordering is enabled, whereas the partitioner's GetPartitions is used if ordering is not enabled (the default). 不使用源分区程序 GetDynamicPartitions 和 GetDynamicOrderedPartitions。The source partitioner's GetDynamicPartitions and GetDynamicOrderedPartitions are not used. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

<Extension()> Public Function AsUnordered(Of TSource) (source As ParallelQuery(Of TSource)) As ParallelQuery(Of TSource)
static member AsUnordered : System.Linq.ParallelQuery<'Source> -> System.Linq.ParallelQuery<'Source>

span.span: The type of elements of source.

param.name: source
param.span: 输入序列。

span.span: The input sequence.

summary.span: 允许将中间查询视为元素之间未应用任何排序。

span.span: Allows an intermediate query to be treated as if no ordering is implied among the elements.

returns.span: 具有任意顺序的源序列。

span.span: The source sequence with arbitrary order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的查询部分不需要排序时，AsUnordered 可能提供性能优势。AsUnordered may provide performance benefits when ordering is not required in a portion of a query. 默认情况下，PLINQ 会将输入的序列将视为无序除非另有指定 OrderBy 或 AsOrdered。By default, PLINQ treats an input sequence as unordered unless OrderBy or AsOrdered is specified. 但是，如果排序已打开并且不再需要然后 AsUnordered 可用于在中间查询中，将其关闭，并且这可能会导致性能优势。AsUnordered 运算符本身不 shuffle 源序列中;它只是将删除对后续运算符的排序要求。However, if ordering was turned on and is no longer needed, then AsUnordered can be used to turn it off in mid-query, and this may result in performance benefits.The AsUnordered operator itself does not shuffle the source sequence; it simply removes the ordering requirement for subsequent operators. 如果源已排序，后续运算符可能会使该排序更高效，若要执行此操作。If the source is ordered, subsequent operators might keep that ordering if it is more efficient to do so. 可以在查询; 中任意位置调用 AsUnordered它不需要 AsParallel 后立即调用。AsUnordered can be called anywhere in the query; it does not need to be called immediately after AsParallel. 有关详细信息，请参阅[了解 PLINQ 中的加速](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/understanding-speedup-in-plinq.md)并[PLINQ 中的顺序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Understanding Speedup in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/understanding-speedup-in-plinq.md) and [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md).

.method public static hidebysig class System.Linq.ParallelQuery`1<!!TSource> Concat<TSource>(class System.Linq.ParallelQuery`1<!!TSource> first, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> second) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The second data source of a binary operator must be of type System.Linq.ParallelQuery<T> rather than System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T>. To fix this problem, use the AsParallel() extension method to convert the right data source to System.Linq.ParallelQuery<T>.")

span.span: This type parameter is not used.

param.name: first
param.span: 未使用此参数。

span.span: This parameter is not used.

param.name: second
param.span: 未使用此参数。

span.span: This parameter is not used.

summary.span: 切勿调用此 Concat 重载。

span.span: This Concat overload should never be called.

summary.span: 此方法已标记为过时，调用此方法时总是会引发 。

span.span: This method is marked as obsolete and always throws when called.
This overload always throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载可禁止使用左侧的数据类型的源的 Concat和正确的数据源类型的。This overload exists to disallow usage of Concat with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否则为 Concat 运算符会显示为绑定到并行实现，但在现实中绑定到顺序实现。Otherwise, the Concat operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

exception.span: 调用此方法时发生的异常。

span.span: The exception that occurs when this method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载可禁止的使用情况的左侧的数据源的类型的情况除外和正确的数据源类型的。This overload exists to disallow usage of Except with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否则为 Except 运算符会显示为绑定到的并行实现中，但在现实中绑定到顺序的实现。Otherwise, the Except operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

exception.span: 调用此方法时发生的异常。

span.span: The exception that occurs when this method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是处理并行化查询的输出，因为它不需要合并步骤结束时的有效方法。This is an efficient way to process the output from a parallelized query because it does not require a merge step at the end. 有关详细信息，请参阅[PLINQ 中的合并选项](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/merge-options-in-plinq.md)或[PLINQ 中的顺序保留](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md)。For more information, see [Merge Options in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/merge-options-in-plinq.md) or [Order Preservation in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/order-preservation-in-plinq.md). 此方法将产生负面影响，因为它可用于观察在并行查询执行的实际顺序。Because this method produces a side-effect, it can be used to observe the actual order of execution in a parallel query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载可禁止的 GroupJoin 左侧的数据源类型的使用情况和正确的数据源类型的。This overload exists to disallow usage of GroupJoin with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否则为 GroupJoin 运算符会显示为绑定到并行实现，但在现实中绑定到顺序实现。Otherwise, the GroupJoin operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与顺序实现，这不是一个稳定排序。In contrast to the sequential implementation, this is not a stable sort. 若要实现一个稳定排序，更改窗体的查询： var 排序 = 源。Select((e,i) = > 新 {E = e，我 = i})。OrderBy((v) = > v.e)。ThenBy (v = > v.i)。Select((v) = > v.e);To achieve a stable sort, change a query of the form: var ordered = source.Select((e,i) => new { E=e, I=i }).OrderBy((v) => v.e).ThenBy(v => v.i).Select((v) => v.e);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载可禁止的 SequenceEqual 左侧的数据源类型的使用情况和正确的数据源类型的。This overload exists to disallow usage of SequenceEqual with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否则为 SequenceEqual 运算符会显示为绑定到并行实现，但在现实中绑定到顺序实现。Otherwise, the SequenceEqual operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载可禁止使用左侧的数据类型的源的 Union和正确的数据源类型的。This overload exists to disallow usage of Union with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否则为 Union 运算符将显示要绑定到并行实现，但在现实中绑定到顺序实现。Otherwise, the Union operator would appear to be binding to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to sequential implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行模式指定是否 PLINQ 将尝试回退到顺序执行，如果它检测到某些查询形状。The execution mode specifies whether PLINQ will attempt to fall back to sequential execution if it detects certain query shapes. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[如何： 在 PLINQ 中指定执行模式](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-execution-mode-in-plinq.md)。For more information and examples, see [How to: Specify the Execution Mode in PLINQ](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-execution-mode-in-plinq.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载可禁止使用左侧的数据源类型的 Zip和正确的数据源类型的。This overload exists to disallow usage of Zip with a left data source of type and a right data source of type . 否则为 Zip 运算符会显示要绑定到并行实现，但在现实中绑定到顺序实现。Otherwise, the Zip operator would appear to be bind to the parallel implementation, but would in reality bind to the sequential implementation.
